title: Client telling you to reinstall to fix this issue? Click here for the solution.
body: Don't bother uninstalling the game, manually delete all of your files located in File Explorer (C://Riot Games). For some reason, there were still files in there from March of this year that wasn't getting deleted. Manually delete everything associated with RIOT Games, then do a fresh install. Hope this helped.

what was your problem? trying to see if its same as mine

If you ever need to reinstall, some of those really old files don't get caught and stick around. You can definitely go through and manually delete them, but a much easier and quicker way would be to grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with **Reinstall and Clean Uninstall** checked. That'll make sure everything gets deleted and the game reinstalls all in one neat little step ^_^!
